title: WTT: T206 Jimmy Hart for Old Mill Southern Leaguers
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Jimmy Hart for Old Mill Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content:
Switching my focus to look for Southern leaguers with Old Mill backs. Please let me know if you're interested in trading/I can balance out with cash. Looking in the good to very good range. Thanks!

Fritz and Reagan are two hot ones on my list for example.
